code: import{useCallback}from'react';import useBombFinance from'./useBombFinance';import useHandleTransactionReceipt from'./useHandleTransactionReceipt';var useRedeem=function useRedeem(bank){var bombFinance=useBombFinance();var handleTransactionReceipt=useHandleTransactionReceipt();var handleRedeem=useCallback(function(){handleTransactionReceipt(bombFinance.exit(bank.contract,bank.poolId),"Redeem ".concat(bank.contract));},[bank,bombFinance,handleTransactionReceipt]);return{onRedeem:handleRedeem};};export default useRedeem;
